snippet: On Saturday, seven teams--each composed of an artist and a representative of the digital revolution--will present the results of one-day creative collaborations at the New Museum. We spoke with the members of one of the more intriguing pairings.
abstract: On Saturday, seven teams--each composed of an artist and a representative of the digital revolution--will present the results of one-day creative collaborations at the New Museum. We spoke with the members of one of the more intriguing pairings.

headline.main: 'Seven on Seven' Collaborators Discuss the Meeting of the Digital and Art Worlds
